attributes.comment:
Please do not increase the fees for overseas adoptions! Many of us are already at
our fingertips to try and bring these children of choice home. Try to think of the
cost in human terms of raising these charges; children will not be brought home
and many will languish far from the arms of those who want so badly to hold and
love them. Surely the more diverse a population in the US the less chance there
is of other nations seeing us as isolationist and a law unto ourselves. Promote the
awareness of of our citizens as good guys by allowing the common folk to show
their care for the children of the world. Don't price us out!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Lisa Watson-Hill
